gender_wage_gap.name: Gender Wage Gap
searchDescriptions: The gender wage gap is defined as the difference between median earnings of men and women relative to median earnings of men.

average_annual_wage.name: Average Annual Wage
searchDescriptions: Average wages are obtained by dividing the national-accounts-based total wage bill by the average number of employees in the total economy, which is then multiplied by the ratio of the average usual weekly hours per full-time employee to the average usually weekly hours for all employees.
